summary: WE HAVE A CUSTOMER WHO IS LEASING THIS VEHICLE FROM US.  THERE WAS A HOOD LATCH RECALL THAT WAS PERFORMED IN MAY 2017.  THE HOOD LATCH STILL WILL NOT OPEN.  THE CUSTOMER CANNOT DRIVE IT.  I WENT TO ORR NISSAN IN HOT SPRINGS, AR AND THEY SAID THIS RECALL IS NOT WARRANTIED.  WE HAVE TRIED TO DIAGNOSE OPENING THE HOOD LATCH, BUT ARE HAVING NO SUCH LUCK TO ASSIST THIS CUSTOMER.  THE CUSTOMER DOES NOT WANT TO SPEND ANY ADDITIONAL MONEY AT THIS POINT.  IS THERE ANYTHING THAT YOU CAN DO TO HELP TO HONOR AND WARRANTY THIS RECALL THAT WAS ALREADY PERFORMED?
